name: Dante's Descent (diogoabnunes)
description:
Dante’s Descent is a RogueLike game where you have to fight hordes of enemies and bosses as you progress deeper into the hell imagined by Dante, in order to meet Lucifer and possibly bring an end to the eternal and sometimes unfair suffering of the many souls damned in this place.

To reach your goal you have at your disposal a scythe and a gun, each with their own abilities, weaknesses and strength.

As the game is still in a Beta state only the first 3 circles are playable: Limbo, Lust and Gluttony, ending with a Final Boss, Cerberus.

Made by:

  • Bernardo Ramalho (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • Diogo Nunes (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • Diogo Santos (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • João Rocha (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • João Rosário (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • Marcelo Reis (M.EIC/FEUP)
  • Pedro Neves (DJAD/ESMAD)
  • Clara Tapadas (DSMD/UP)
  • Natália Santos (DSMD/UP)
